title: Watch This Asshole Alligator Steal a Little Kid's Big Catch
text:
Watch This Asshole Alligator Steal a Little Kid's Big Catch 
No dinner, sureâ€”but a great story. Most Popular By Sammy Nickalls Feb 27, 2017 We don't know who took this video, or the names of the people featured in it. We don't know the origins of this video, other than the trustworthy Facebook page Bass Masters and Fish Experts . But we do know that this alligator is a grade-A asshole.   this short clip, a boy named Connor starts to reel in his big catch with the encouragement of, presumably, his father. However, another man on the pier noticed Asshole Alligator eyeing up the catch, and although he tried to distract the gator, that fish got snatched up and stolen away. Rude. Related Story
